title: More code reformatting:
body:
For src\tasks\e*-q*.cs
- Code style updates (mostly automated)
- Reduced .NET 1.x data structure use to reduce up- and down-casting
- Reduced allocations in a couple of spots

commit.message:
More code reformatting:
- Code style updates (mostly automated)
- Reduced .NET 1.x data structure use to reduce up and downcasting
- Reduced allocations in a couple of spots

nodes.body:
@dotnet-bot test Ubuntu16.04 Build for CoreCLR please

@rainersigwald uhh any idea how `Ubuntu14.04 Build for CoreCLR` could still be queuing to run?
Bunch of dangling comments wherever this refactoring ran. Sad the duplicated comments were there in the first place.
Fixed in following PR coming today/tomorrow, if that's OK
